Count and normalize ChIP-seq read coverage

Source: R/chip_utils.R
count_normalize_chip.Rd

Count and normalize ChIP-seq read coverage

count_normalize_chip(
  pwm_id,
  cell_type,
  training_metadata,
  sites_file,
  chrom_size_file,
  chip_dir,
  outdir,
  outname,
  ref.size = 1e+07,
  bedtools_path = "bedtools"
)

Arguments

pwm_id

Motif pwm ID

cell_type

Cell type

training_metadata

training metadata

sites_file

Filename for candidate sites

chrom_size_file

Filename for chromosome sizes

chip_dir

Directory of ChIP-seq bam files

outdir

Output directory

outname

Output filename prefix

ref.size

ChIP-Seq reference library size (Default: 10 million)

bedtools_path

Path to bedtools executable

Contents

Developed by Kaixuan Luo, Jianling Zhong, Alex Hartemink.
